item.title: OSP14 Configure Network for Manila
item.description: OSP Network Topology Environment The undercloud is 192.168.1.202. The overcloud is deployed on ubuntu-server2 (compute node) and ubuntu-server10 (control node). Ethernet interfaces on ubuntu-server10 are: enp8s0f0: enp8s0f1: eth1, used for overcloud tenant network. enp8s0f2: eth0, used for OSP Provision/Ctrl Plane network. eno1: eth2, not used. enp8s0f3: ens2f1: eth3, connected to br-ex, used to External network. Ethernet interfaces on ubuntu-server2 are: TBD Undercloud uses 192.168.139.* subnet to dhcp overcloud nodes.
